meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, they made a pledge to always be there for each other.
meanings.sent2: She kept her pledge to help her friend in times of need.
meanings.sent3: The pledge to always share their snacks became a running joke among friends.
meanings.sent4: His pledge to protect her was as strong as a suit of armor.
meanings.sent5: The pledge to never give up echoed in their hearts like a steady drumbeat.

meanings.definition: A formal promise or agreement to do something.
meanings.sent1: The company signed a pledge to reduce their carbon footprint by 50%.
meanings.sent2: Her pledge to volunteer at the shelter every weekend was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The pledge to always bring cookies to the meetings was met with cheers.
meanings.sent4: Their pledge to work together harmoniously was the key to their success.
meanings.sent5: The pledge to always be honest created a strong bond of trust among them.

meanings.definition: Something given as security for the performance of an action.
meanings.sent1: He left his watch as a pledge for borrowing the book.
meanings.sent2: The necklace served as a pledge for the loan she received.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was the pledge for their agreement to paint the fence.
meanings.sent4: The antique vase was the pledge for the deal they made.
meanings.sent5: The rare coin was the pledge for the antique shop owner's promise.

meanings.definition: To promise or undertake to do something.
meanings.sent1: She would always pledge to support her friends in their endeavors.
meanings.sent2: He pledged to donate a portion of his earnings to charity.
meanings.sent3: The kids pledged to finish their homework before playing outside.
meanings.sent4: They pledged to always stand by each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: He pledged to never forget the lessons his grandmother taught him.

meanings.definition: To commit oneself to a particular course of action.
meanings.sent1: He decided to pledge his loyalty to the king and serve him faithfully.
meanings.sent2: She pledged to work hard and achieve her dreams no matter what.
meanings.sent3: The team pledged to train diligently for the upcoming championship.
meanings.sent4: They pledged to fight for justice and equality in their community.
meanings.sent5: She pledged to always strive for excellence in everything she did.
